feed.title: the momen-tum is nearer
feed.subtitle: A home for thoughts that build momentum, ideas that ship, and notes from the journey.

entry.title: the momen-tum is nearer
entry.content:
For years, I wanted to start a blog. I never really expected anyone to read it, and I kept waiting for the perfect moment or for some kind of permission to begin. But I’ve realized that I don’t need to wait any longer.

There’s more to come.
entry.summary: For years, I wanted to start a blog. I never really expected anyone to read it, and I kept waiting for the perfect moment or for some kind of permission to begin. But I’ve realized that I don’t need to wait any longer.
